formatDescription: ACE is a compressed archive format, originally developed by Marcel Lemke and later by e-merge GmbH. Some relevant software includes Ace (for DOS, OS/2 and Windows console, WinAce, Active ACE and ACE Compression.
provenanceCompoundName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University

internalSignatures.name: ACE Archive 1
internalSignatures.note: BOF; Offset: 7; Magic Bytes: '**ACE**' followed by byte of either 0x0A, 0x0B, 0x0C or 0x0D and then either 0x0A, 0x0B, 0x0C, 0x0D or 0x14
